name: structure-view
description: Structure View for ATOM, just like Outline view in Eclipse or Structure tool window in IDEA / WebStorm, provides quick navigation for symbols of source code with a tree view.

ShowOnStartup.title: Show On Startup
ShowOnStartup.description: Show the Stucture View on startup.

ShowVariables.title: Show Variables
ShowVariables.description: If you don't need variables in the structure of file, just uncheck this config.

ShowProperties.title: Show Properties
ShowProperties.description: If you don't need properties in the structure of file (such as CSS), just uncheck this config.

DoubleClickToFoldTreeView.title: Double Click To Fold Tree View
DoubleClickToFoldTreeView.description: If this value is false, then select tag and toggle the tree view would all by single click.

AutoscrollFromSource.title: Autoscroll from Source (Beta)
AutoscrollFromSource.description: Enable this feature to have Atom automatically move the focus in the Structure View to the node that corresponds to the code where the cursor is currently positioned in the editor.
